title: Commemorative Plaque with Bust of Lenin
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Circular disk of bisque porcelain with bust of lenin in relief and inscription (in Ukranian?) "In honor of the 100th anniversary of the birth of Lenin;" enclosed in square frame with red enameled and gilded trim
name: Plaque
